summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1810, for the improvement of Boren Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from the center of John Street to a connection with the existing sewer at Thomas Street, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 18824 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
